griffon.javafx.support

Interface ActionMatcher


  • public interface ActionMatcher
    Strategy for matching controller actions to widgets defined in FXML.
    Since:
    2.10.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ActionMatcher DEFAULT
      Matches a widget whose action id has been defined by using the default convention.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void match(Object node, String actionName, JavaFXAction action) 

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final ActionMatcher DEFAULT
        Matches a widget whose action id has been defined by using the default convention. Either the action id was defined using JavaFXUtils.griffonActionId or it has "ActionTarget" as a suffix. Examples:
